allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Fix critical optimizer bugs and add strategy parameter research

Optimizer fixes:
- Fix n_jobs=1 hardcoded - now uses self.n_jobs for parallel execution
- Fix FrozenTrial crash in _save_best_parameters - added _organize_flat_params helper
- Fix profit_factor=0 when no losses - now returns 100.0 (capped infinity)

Strategy parameter research:
- Add comprehensive docs/STRATEGY_PARAMETER_RESEARCH.md with 17 parameter analysis
- Update hedge_grid_v1.yaml with research-optimized starting values
- Key change: tp_steps 2â†’3 improves R/R from 2.5:1 to 1.67:1 (37% vs 71% break-even)

Additional fixes from previous session:
- Initialize _last_diagnostic_log in strategy __init__
- Fix normalizer to handle both simple and OHLCV mark price formats
- Update test fixtures for new data formats
- Fix SQLite isolation level (DEFERRED)

All 605 tests passing.

EOF
)")
